TopicTitle: So I was doing my homework and....

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

I was (well still am) Doing my homework to find space pictures and I found this EPIC photo:

IF Laythe had life on it or in the far future when its fully released we will be able to plant trees and everyting, this will be epic sight! Also Jool would need rings. Or maybe the future planet too? who knows but this picture has to be taken in KSP someday! I promise you kerbalnaughts!!!!
I've always thought of Laythe as a reference to 2064, Odyssey 3.
